title: fraudulent tax refund
extract: The IRS ranked identity theft tax refund fraud as its No. 1 scam last year. (See “IRS Releases the Dirty Dozen Tax Scams for 2013.”) ... The scam usually occurs when “an identity thief uses a legitimate taxpayer's identity to file a fraudulent tax return and claim a refund.
extract_html: The IRS ranked identity theft tax refund fraud as its No. 1 scam last year. (See “IRS Releases the Dirty Dozen Tax Scams for 2013.”) ... The scam usually occurs when “an identity thief uses a legitimate taxpayer's identity to file a fraudulent tax return and claim a refund.
